name: Nuremberg Castle (Kaiserburg)
description: A historic castle complex offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Documentation Center Nazi Party Rally Grounds
description: A museum and memorial documenting the history of the Nazi regime.

name: St. Lorenz Church
description: A stunning Gothic church known for its impressive architecture and art.

name: Germanisches Nationalmuseum
description: The largest museum of cultural history in the German-speaking world.

name: Hauptmarkt and Schöner Brunnen
description: The central market square featuring the beautiful Schöner Brunnen fountain.

name: Albrecht Dürer's House
description: The former residence of the famous Renaissance artist Albrecht Dürer, now a museum.

name: Nuremberg Zoo (Tiergarten Nürnberg)
description: A well-maintained zoo home to a wide variety of animals and beautiful gardens.

name: Frauenkirche
description: A historic church known for its unique architecture and rich history.

name: Toy Museum (Spielzeugmuseum)
description: A museum showcasing a vast collection of toys from different eras.

name: Handwerkerhof
description: A charming craftsmen’s courtyard featuring traditional Bavarian shops and eateries.
